lead_paragraph: The police said they believed that the suspects, one of whom was a woman thought to be a potential suicide bomber, were planning an attack on a presidential palace this weekend.

headline.main: Indonesian Police Arrest 4 Near Jakarta as Terrorist Plot Is Foiled
